Class NativeThread

java.lang.Object

      freenet.support.io.NativeThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class NativeThread
extends Thread

Do *NOT* forget to call super.run() if you extend it!

Author:
Florent Daignière <nextgens@freenetproject.org>
